entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 08:00 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %

Dewpoint: -13.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this morning. Wind south 30 km/h becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
